item.title: 印度法院下令调查前市场监管局长的腐败问题
item.description: 就在印度证券交易委员会前主席任期结束几天后，一家特别法庭下令对其财务欺诈指控展开调查。【原文：A special court has ordered an investigation into allegations of financial fraud against the Securities and Exchange Board of India’s former head, just days after her term ended.】

item.title: 沙特预算摇摆不定，阿美公司 1 240 亿美元支出的未来成为焦点
item.description: 阿美石油公司（Aramco）是世界上最大的石油公司，该公司本周就其红利问题做出的关键决定将对沙特阿拉伯日益疲软的财政状况产生重大影响。【原文：Aramco’s key decision this week on its dividend — the world’s largest — is set to have major implications for Saudi Arabia’s weakening finances.】

item.title: 科技巨头岌岌可危，期权交易员寻找掩护
item.description: 在追逐大型科技股看似势不可挡的涨势两年后，期权交易员们已显露出疲态。【原文：After two years of chasing the seeming unstoppable rally in big technology stocks, options traders are showing signs of fatigue.】

item.title: 前官员警告：英格兰银行可能需要暂停降息
item.description: 英格兰银行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）认为，通胀重现无需担心。前政策制定者则不这么认为，他们表示央行可能需要暂停降息周期。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey thinks a renewed bout of inflation is nothing to worry about. Former policymakers are less convinced and say the central bank may need to pause its interest-rate cutting cycle.】

item.title: 欧洲央行降息进入最后阶段，分歧日益扩大
item.description: 欧洲中央银行已接近其降息周期的最后阶段，内部分歧将使未来几个月的决策变得更加复杂。【原文：The European Central Bank is nearing the final leg of its interest rate-cutting cycle with internal divisions set to complicate decision-making over the months ahead.】

item.title: 环球时报》称中国可能针对美国农作物加征关税
item.description: 据《环球时报》报道，针对特朗普政府定于周二生效的关税，中国正在考虑对美国农产品和食品采取报复性措施。【原文：China is considering retaliatory measures on US agriculture and food products in response to tariffs from the Trump administration that are scheduled to take effect on Tuesday, according to the Global Times.】

item.title: 尽管面临关税威胁，高盛和美国银行仍回调看跌人民币的押注
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发出对中国征收额外关税的新威胁后，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）和美银证券（BofA Securities）撤回了部分看跌人民币的预测。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc and BofA Securities rolled back some of their bearish forecasts for the yuan on the heels of fresh threats from US President Donald Trump to impose additional tariffs on China.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴支持的智脉科技融资 1.4 亿美元，DeepSeek 在人工智能领域大展拳脚
item.description: 中国初创公司智璞在由地方政府支持的公司主导的一轮融资中筹集了超过 10 亿元人民币（1.4 亿美元）的资金，这凸显出继 DeepSeek 的崛起之后，人们对国内人工智能的兴趣与日俱增。【原文：Chinese startup Zhipu raised more than 1 billion yuan ($140 million) in a financing round led by local government-backed firms, underscoring the growing interest in domestic AI following DeepSeek’s ascent.】

item.title: 供应过剩加剧，中国可能重启煤炭进口管制
item.description: 据摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）称，在主要行业组织就全球最大的煤炭市场供应过剩问题发出警告后，中国可能重新对煤炭实施进口管制。【原文：China could reestablish import controls on coal, after leading industry groups warned on mounting oversupply in the world’s biggest market for the fuel, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 据说日本金融服务管理局将审查寿险公司的再保险风险
item.description: 据知情人士透露，日本金融监管机构正在对人寿保险公司进行调查，以研究这些公司日益增多的将保单责任转移给由全球投资公司支持的再保险公司的做法所带来的风险。【原文：Japan’s financial regulator is surveying life insurers to examine risks tied to their growing practice of transferring policy liabilities to reinsurers backed by global investment firms, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 加纳中央银行新任行长暂停黄金换石油计划
item.description: 加纳新任央行行长已经暂停了这个西非国家用黄金支付石油的计划，并表示他希望塞地在经历去年的波动后能够稳定下来。【原文：Ghana’s new central bank chief has suspended the West African nation’s program of paying for oil with gold and said he expects the cedi to stabilize after it’s volatility of last year.】

item.title: 小米推出配备先进摄像头的 15 超智能手机，价格不菲
item.description: 小米公司（Xiaomi Corp. ）推出了一款新的旗舰手机，售价为 1,499 欧元（1,560 美元），希望进一步进军传统上由苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：Xiaomi Corp. introduced a new flagship handset priced at €1,499 ($1,560) in a bid to push further into the premium market traditionally dominated by Apple Inc.】

item.title: 中国液化天然气进口量降至科维德公司成立以来最低点 2020 年需求将受冲击
item.description: 由于需求疲软和欧洲价格上涨吸引货物前往中国，上个月中国的液化天然气进口量降至五年来的最低点。【原文：China’s liquefied natural import gas imports fell to a five-year low last month on weak demand and higher European prices luring cargoes there.】

item.title: 印度国内生产总值数据公布后，印度股市或将反弹，亚洲市场提供积极信号
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 百度计划出售离岸人民币债券融资 14 亿美元
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，中国领先的搜索引擎运营商百度公司正计划发行约 100 亿元人民币（14 亿美元）的海外债券，为中国科技公司近期的一系列债务融资再添一笔。【原文：Baidu Inc., the operator of China’s leading search engine, is planning to offer about 10 billion yuan ($1.4 billion) of bonds offshore, people familiar with the matter said, adding to a string of recent debt financings by the nation’s tech companies.】

item.title: 据说 Chubb 接近收购自由保险公司泰国和越南分公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Chubb Ltd. 正接近达成收购 Liberty Mutual Holding Co. 在泰国和越南业务的交易，以加强其在东南亚的业务。【原文：Chubb Ltd. is nearing a deal to acquire Liberty Mutual Holding Co.’s businesses in Thailand and Vietnam as it seeks to boost its presence in Southeast Asia, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国工厂活动回升，显示经济韧性增强
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，中国上个月的制造业活动有所回升，这表明在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对亚洲国家的出口产品征收更多关税的情况下，中国的经济仍有韧性。【原文：China’s manufacturing activity picked up last month, according to a private survey, indicating economic resilience in the face of US President Donald Trump slapping more tariffs on the Asian nation’s exports.】

item.title: Shriram Finance 计划贷款，为创纪录的 20 亿美元融资锦上添花
item.description: 印度最大的卡车融资商 Shriram Finance Ltd. 正在与银行洽谈融资事宜，融资额最高可达 2.5 亿美元，这是该公司本财年通过海外贷款融资 20 亿美元的又一纪录。【原文：Shriram Finance Ltd., India’s biggest truck financier, is in talks with banks to raise up to $250 million, adding to its record of $2 billion borrowing through offshore loans this financial year.】

item.title: 在美国供应增加的情况下，钢铁制造商浦项制铁致力于扩大液化天然气业务
item.description: 拥有韩国最大钢铁制造商的浦项制铁控股公司（Posco Holdings Inc.【原文：Posco Holdings Inc., which owns South Korea’s top steelmaker, will expand its liquefied natural gas businesses in a bid to benefit from the rapidly growing market and President Donald Trump’s strategy of boosting US exports.】

item.title: 美国农民将获得首批 300 亿美元资金以应对经济衰退
item.description: 美国农业部长布鲁克-罗林斯（Brooke Rollins）表示，美国农民将很快开始收到国会批准的首批 300 亿美元资金，以应对市场低迷。【原文：American farmers will soon start receiving the first tranche of $30 billion in funding approved by Congress to fight a downturn in the markets, according to Agriculture Secretary Brooke Rollins.】

item.title: 特朗普关税引发经济担忧，黄金回调后上涨
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普准备对主要贸易伙伴实施进口关税，投资者正在权衡经济前景，黄金在上周大幅回调后上涨。【原文：Gold rose after last week’s sharp correction, with investors weighing the economic outlook as US President Donald Trump prepares to implement import levies against key trade partners.】

item.title: 新加坡亿万富翁的 CDL 在家族纷争后恢复交易
item.description: 城市发展有限公司（City Developments Ltd.）周一解除停牌，该公司股票将迎来一个动荡的开盘。【原文：City Developments Ltd.’s shares are set for a turbulent open when it lifts a trading halt on Monday, following a family feud playing out in public.】

item.title: JX Metals 下调日本 2018 年以来最大规模 IPO 的价格
item.description: JX Advanced Metals Corp.公司以市场疲软为由，下调了可能是日本自2018年以来规模最大的首次公开募股的拟议价格。【原文：JX Advanced Metals Corp. cut the proposed price of what will likely be Japan’s biggest initial public offering since 2018, citing market weakness.】

item.title: 意大利萨帕在汽车供应商整合中收购 Megatech
item.description: 意大利汽车零部件制造商萨帕集团（Sapa Group）同意收购竞争对手 Megatech Industries AG，在许多供应商陷入困境之际，获得了欧洲主要汽车制造商的更大支持。【原文：Italian car-parts maker Sapa Group agreed to buy rival Megatech Industries AG, gaining greater heft with major European automakers at a time when many suppliers are struggling.】

item.title: 信实集团因抨击安巴尼帝国而面临印度罚款的风险
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）领导的信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）旗下的一个部门因未能建立一家电池厂而面临被处罚的风险，该工厂是印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）推动减少进口依赖的一部分。【原文：A unit of billionaire Mukesh Ambani-led Reliance Industries Ltd. risks being penalized after failing to set up a battery cell plant that formed part of Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s push to cut import dependence, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 交易商权衡特朗普关税的影响，石油走高
item.description: 本周伊始，由于市场为唐纳德-特朗普总统对包括中国在内的美国主要贸易伙伴征收关税以及任何可能的报复行动做好了准备，石油价格有所上涨。【原文：Oil gained at the start of the week as the market prepared for President Donald Trump’s tariffs on major US trading partners including China and any potential retaliation.】

item.title: 中国国会为全球大宗商品价格指明方向
item.description: 中国的年度代表大会是在工业产能过剩、房地产市场依然不景气以及与美国的贸易战有可能恶化的背景下召开的。这个全球最大的原材料消费国就所有这些挑战做出的决定，可能会对全球大宗商品市场产生决定性影响。【原文：China’s annual congress meets against a backdrop of industrial overcapacity, a still-floundering property market and the prospect of a worsening trade war with the US. Decisions on all these challenges by the world’s biggest consumer of raw materials could be decisive for global commodities markets.】

item.title: 澳大利亚东海岸进入警戒状态，气旋即将抵达布里斯班
item.description: 澳大利亚东海岸正准备应对潮涌、强降雨、强风和洪水，因为一场气旋预计将向该国第三大城市倾斜。【原文：Australia’s east coast is bracing for tidal surges, intense rainfall, strong winds and flooding as a cyclone is expected to veer toward the country’s third-biggest city.】

item.title: 空客二月份飞机产量预计将比一月份有所改善
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）2月份的飞机交付量比1月份有所增长，表明该公司在应对供应商挑战方面取得了进展，这些挑战阻碍了欧洲飞机制造商的产量。【原文：Airbus SE notched an improvement in February aircraft deliveries from January’s subpar showing, indicating progress in contending with supplier challenges that have hindered output at the European planemaker.】

item.title: 食品通胀加剧，日本消费者寻求实惠
item.description: 日本的通货膨胀率为 4%，但小宫山泰美（Taemi Komiyama）发现，养家糊口的成本上升速度远远超过这个数字。【原文：Inflation in Japan is running at 4%, but Taemi Komiyama finds the cost of feeding her family is escalating much faster than that.】
